name: releaseorchestrator
description: Manage and orchestrate Azure DevOps release pipelines
helpMarkDown: For aditional information and support please refer to <https://github.com/dmitryserbin/azdev-release-orchestrator> project repository
author: Dmitry Serbin

inputs.name: endpointType
inputs.label: Azure DevOps endpoint type
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Select endpoint type to connect to Azure DevOps: 
- Integrated = default 'SystemVssConnection' service endpoint for 'Project Collection Build Service' user account; 
- Service = user-defined personal access token (PAT) service endpoint 

Note: requires 'View releases', 'View release definition', 'Create releases' and 'Manage deployments' target release pipeline permissions

inputs.name: endpointName
inputs.label: Service endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select service endpoint for Azure DevOps connection

inputs.name: projectName
inputs.label: Project name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify target project name or ID

inputs.name: definitionName
inputs.label: Definition name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify target release definition name or ID

inputs.name: releaseStrategy
inputs.label: Release strategy
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select release strategy to perform target release deployment. Create new release, target specific or latest release in the release definition

inputs.name: releaseName
inputs.label: Release name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify target release name or ID (shows last 25 releases)

inputs.name: releaseStage
inputs.label: Release stage
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify target release stage filter (comma separated)

inputs.name: definitionStage
inputs.label: Definition stage
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify target release definition stage filter (comma separated)

inputs.name: releaseTag
inputs.label: Release tag
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify target release tag filter (comma separated, last 100 releases)

inputs.name: artifactVersion
inputs.label: Artifact version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify target release primary build type artifact version filter (i.e. build number, last 100 builds)

inputs.name: artifactTag
inputs.label: Artifact tag
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify target release primary build type artifact tag filter (comma separated, last 100 builds)

inputs.name: artifactBranch
inputs.label: Artifact branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify target release primary artifact source branch filter. Example = 'refs/heads/master' (build artifact, last 100 builds) or 'master' (Git artifact)

inputs.name: stageStatus
inputs.label: Target stage status
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify target release stage status filter (comma separated). Options: succeeded, partiallySucceeded, notStarted, rejected & canceled

inputs.name: releaseVariables
inputs.label: Release variables
inputs.helpMarkDown: Override target release pipeline variables when creating a new release. Specified release variables must be configured to be 'settable at release time'. In 'Name=Value' format, special characters supported, new line separated

inputs.name: ignoreFailure
inputs.label: Ignore failures
inputs.helpMarkDown: Suppress errors and set task result to partially succeeded in case of a failure. Default = false

inputs.name: approvalRetry
inputs.label: Approval retries
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify number of attempts to retry (with 1 minute delay) approving target release stage deployment (if unsuccessful) before failing. Default = 60 (times)

validation.message: Approval retries must be within 0 <=> 100 range

inputs.name: updateInterval
inputs.label: Update interval
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify number of seconds to wait before next release deployment progress update. Default = 5 (seconds)

validation.message: Update interval must be within 1 <=> 300 range
